problem.markdown:
If instead of: cascade (3) times ( * 2) of (10) We had: cadcade (4) times ( + 5) of ((#) cascade (1) times ( mod 2) of (10))
What will the new cascade return? ( ) 21 (x) 20 ( ) 30 ( ) 25
[explanation] The nested cascade simply finds he remainder of 10 divided by 2. It is equivalent to just (10 mod 2) since we are only cascading once. Then the nested cascade returns 0 (since 10 mod 2 = 0).
The other cascade adds 5 to 0 4 times. So we would get: (0 ->) 5 -> 10 -> 15 -> 20 Thus ultimately returning 20. [explanation]
problem.p: cadcade (4) times ( + 5) of ((#) cascade (1) times ( mod 2) of (10))
What will the new cascade return?

div.p: The nested cascade simply finds he remainder of 10 divided by 2. It is equivalent to just (10 mod 2) since we are only cascading once. Then the nested cascade returns 0 (since 10 mod 2 = 0).
The other cascade adds 5 to 0 4 times. So we would get: (0 ->) 5 -> 10 -> 15 -> 20
